lightness.name: Boots of Lightness
lightness.desc:
+15% Movement Speed
Active: Get +8% Movement Speed for 6 seconds and ignore slow affects. [Cooldown: 60 seconds]

ninja_boots.name: Ninja Boots
ninja_boots.desc:
+15% Movement Speed
Active: Blink at a target location. [Cooldown: 60 seconds]

leather_boots.name: Leather Boots
leather_boots.desc:
+15% Movement Speed, +10 Armor, +150 Health, +15 Physical Power
Active: Knock back a nearby enemy front of you and stun they for 0,5 seconds. [Cooldown: 60 seconds]

iron.name: Boots of Iron
iron.desc:
+15% Movement Speed, +20 Armor
Passive: 10% Protection to all sorts of damage against you.

nymph.name: Nymph Boots
nymph.desc:
+15% Movement Speed, +25 Magic Protection, +20 Magic Power, +20% Crowd Control
Active: Remove all Crowd Control on you and make you invulnerable agenst it for 2,5 seconds. [Cooldown: 60 seconds]

wizardy.name: Wizard Boots
wizardy.desc:
+15% Movement Speed, +25 Magic Power, +15 Magic Penetration
Passive: 10% Cooldown Reduction to Abilitys and actives from items.

gloves_power.name: Gloves of Power
gloves_power.desc:
+10% Attack Speed, +20 Physical Power, +5 Armor Penetration
Active: +15% Attack Speed for 4 seconds. [Cooldown: 60 seconds]

gloves_vital.name: Gloves of Vital
gloves_vital.desc: +10% Attack Speed, +15% Crit Chance, +30 Crit Damage

military.name: Gloves of Military
military.desc:
+10% Attack Speed, +10 Armor, +100 Health, +15 Physical Power
Passive: Hitting enemies with basic attack, increases +2 Physical Power with a maximum of 20 stacks last 5 seconds.

iron_gloves.name: Iron Gloves
iron_gloves.desc:
+10% Attack Speed, +20 Armor, +20 Physical Power
Passive: 10% Protection to all sorts of damage agenst you.

nymph_gloves.name: Nymph Gloves
nymph_gloves.desc:
+10% Attack Speed, +25 Magic Protection, +20 Magic Power
Passive: 10% Cooldown Reduction to Abilitys and actives from items.

wizardy_gloves.name: Wizardy Gloves
wizardy_gloves.desc:
+10% Attack Speed, +25 Magic Power, +15 Magic Penetration
Passive: Every tenth ability use, increases your next basic attack by 200% damage as magic.

frozen_gloves.name: Frozen Gloves
frozen_gloves.desc:
+10% Attack Speed, +12 Magic Protection, +12 Armor, +12 Physical Power, +12 Magic Power
Passive: Basic attacks now slow enemies by 6% over 1 second.

conquest.name: Conquest
conquest.desc: In Conquest, two teams of five players fight off in a three-laned map with turrets and a big jungle. Conquest is about a fight between the city of Mordune and Kingdom Port, then each of them sending troops to the mitt between the Valkyrie river called Conquest!

arena.name: Arena
arena.desc: In Arena, two teams of five players in a small arena with no lanes nor towers. Arena is about a fight to show who the strongest heroes and to get popularity from the people in the city of Peace!

3v3.name: 3v3
3v3.desc: In 3v3, two teams of three players fight off in a two-laned map with turrets and a small jungle. 3v3 is about two teams with three heroes each team inside the dark forest.

one_path.name: One Path
one_path.desc: One Path, two teams of five players trying to get to their other side, with two turrets each team.

angels_demons.name: Uranus
angels_demons.desc: In Uranus, two teams of five players fight off in a three-laned map with turrets and a jungle in the city. Uranus is a war between angels and demons up in the city of sky named Uranus built from the hight archangels.

thebridge.name: Bridge in to the Mountain
thebridge.desc: In the bridge, two teams [defenders and attackers] with five players each team in one lane without walls. Falling down kill you, but each player got a decreased death-cooldown. In a time limit, the attackers are supposed to let their minions destroy the other teams turret, while the defender are defending it.

zombiecity.name: Zombie City
zombiecity.desc: In Zombie City, two teams of five players collecting points by surviving zombie waves. With abilities like leap can jump to the roof on the houses.

tempel.name: Tempel of Spirits
tempel.desc: In Tempel of Spirits, two teams of five players trying to open the chest by activates some crystalls. By leap you can go to special places and get gold for your team.

4v4_volcano.name: 4v4_Volcano
4v4_volcano.desc: In 4v4 Volcano, two teams of four players fight off in a two-laned with turrets and some reign of fire.

anni.name: Anni
anni.title: The Friend of Animals
anni.desc: Anni lives in the city of Kingdom Port, royal and the youngest sister to Asula and Aenna. While Asula forced into the military, Anni stayed by her love for the animals in the nature. She borrowed two guns from the pirates, and got her animals by her side then she must go serious!

prop.Active:
Anni summon polecats that fighting for you, fetch enemies in the area and dealing physical damage.
The polecats can't be touched, but affecting enemies by slowness while running around they legs.
Anni get power from her family, gain increased Attack Speed, Movement Speed and Physical Power for a short duration.

Anni get sight from the birds, the same second each enemy who get catch by her sight get a peck from a bird. Dealing physical damage to each enemy and debuff they Armor for a short duration.
For a short duration, Anni can see invisibility and her allies inside this sight of area.
Anni sending a bear to a target location, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit and stunning them.

aria.name: Aria
aria.title: The Winged Archer
aria.desc: Aria is an angel of light with healing tactics, younger sister to Oone that is the leader of the military by the light angels. Aria fighting for the humans to create balance, with her bow and wings she can cause much damage, but with her healing skills she can also treat the wounded!

prop.Active: Aria launch a light arrow that pierce through enemies and allies in a line, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and make them paralyzed, but heal allies hit in the line.

Aria creates a magical shield around her that absorbing a % of all incoming damage for a short duration. Then this shield ends, it dealing magic damage to enemies hit around you, but heal you and your allies hit inside the area.

Aria flying up and sending her feathers at a target location, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit and slowing their movement speed for a short duration.
In the second she fly up, she ignoring all attacks that aren't from the sky.
Aria sprinting fast in a line, her next basic attack will do a bonus magic damage. She can do this 3 times before the cooldown start.

blade.name: Blade
blade.title: The Bladed Magician
blade.desc: Blade lives in the city of Peace with a ruth childhood by standing up against her rival, Katana. They both parents died then they were young, then they struggled to live in the big city. She got an experience by using her magic to bend her blades around, with that tactic she create pain by magical power from being hit by her blades, but her Movements aren't like Katanas. By her tactics, she make her enemies confused by binding them together with magical force.

prop.Active:
Blade throw all her seven blades in a wide line, dealing physical damage each blade hit.
Every hit by your basic attacks decreases this cooldown by 0,5 seconds.
prop.Passive: Every seventh time she hit an enemy, deal an extra bonus magic damage.
prop.Bonus: Magic: 100 (+4 per hero level = 180 at lvl 20)

prop.Active:
Blade blink to a nearby target location, lets her crit by her next basic hit with a increased crit damage the last 3 seconds.
Every hit by your basic attacks decreases this cooldown by 0,5 seconds.
prop.Passive:
Blade get increased crit chance, every time she crit, the targeted and hunted enemy takes magic damage from a magical pulse.
2,5 seconds cooldown.

prop.Active: Blade force a magical damage to all enemies who are binded to each other, also stunning them.
prop.Passive:
Blade bind her enemies by her basic attacks, hitting two differently enemies binding them together.
Hunted enemies can't run from each other, using a leap away they are pulled back.
prop.Damage: Magic: 40 / 70 / 100 / 130 / 160 (+4 per hero level +80 at lvl 20)

prop.Active: Blade increases her attack speed and lets her blades seek to the nearest hunted enemy.

chantrea.name: Chantrea
chantrea.title: Huntress of The Moon
chantrea.desc: Chantrea is an elven princess in City of Forest, leader in the hunt, younger sister to Spiro who rather choose his magic in front of the royal duty. Her wisest guide is Grey Wonder who learned her the moon energy, letting her arrows seek to enemies.

prop.Active: Chantrea sending a beam from the sky as a moon light at a target location, dealing magic damage and stunning all enemies hit.
Chantreas next three arrows piercing through enemies in a line, at the end of the line, they start to seek to the nearest target.
prop.Passive:
Her arrows seek to the last enemy hit if you miss your target, but just a % of your damage.
crit cause an extra true damage from a % of your magic power and seek to an other enemy nearby your target.

prop.Active:
Chantrea whistling on her pet, dash forward while riding on it, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and pulling they back.
In a duration, she get increased movement speed and ignoring body effects.
Chantrea targeting one enemy in a long sight, waiting for 2,5 seconds then aim, dealing physical damage to the first enemy hero hit.

cicada.name: Cicada
cicada.title: The Insect Queen
cicada.desc: Cicada lives in the dark forest, living as a forest keeper that hate humans. Kokong enemies and fly around to look for new enemies. Because of her insect eyes she is an incredible killing machine with her arrows!

prop.Active: Cicada launch an arrow in a line, kokong the first enemy hit and dealing physical damage.

Cicada lay a webb trap at a target location, ensnare the first enemie walking over it.
Triggering the trap summon small spiders that attack the targeted enemy, dealing physical damage over time.
prop.Passive: Cicada get increased Attack Speed and Movement Speed by her level.

prop.Active:
Cicada dash forward and create a trail of webb, affecting enemies by slowness who walking over it.
Enemies hit by your dash gets caught by your webb, ensnare enemies and dealing physical damage to them.
Cicada flying around in a circle, can launch an arrow at a target location while flying, dealing physical damage to enemies hit each arrow launch.

clear.name: Clear
clear.title: The Bloody Cowboy
clear.desc: Clear is a cowboy in City of Desert, doesn't have family or siblings. She works alone and always been alone and have always trying to hunting down the rogue broders Razor and Rexas! She is the best fighter with a whip by her movements and strength, letting her whip destroy her opponents ribs and letting they bleed.

prop.Active: Clear strike with her whip in a line, dealing physical damage to enemies hit, let them bleed and take a % more damage from physical while they bleed.
prop.Passive: Basic attacks now mark her enemies, dealing 2% more damage every stuck. (max 10%)

prop.Active:
Clear leap to the first turret or tree she hit, but root the first enemy catch by her whip in the line.
Root a enemy makes so you can't attack, but let you leap to a location between left, right or forward over the rooted enemy by a time of 1,5 seconds before the root ends.
After your leap, your next basic attack will do a % extra physical damage.
Clear wheel forward, dealing physical damage to all enemies from behind and pushing they back.
Clear pushes back all enemies in a area around her, affecting enemies by slowness and make them bleed over a time.

dwarlin.name: Dwarlin
dwarlin.title: The Beast Hunter
dwarlin.desc: Dwarlin lives in Winterfall, friend to Storm but always start a fight with Tumblr. His axes got a enchantment to create shock pulses that he has learned to use, also created a habit to overloading the magical force that make him impossible to fight against!

prop.Active: Dwarlin throw both of his axes, piercing through enemies in a line, dealing physical damage.
prop.Passive: The third hit at an enemy target create a wound that causing them to bleed and slow they movement speed.

prop.Active:
Dwarlin sets a trap at the target location that arms after 1.1 seconds and lasts up to 90 seconds. After the maximum amount of traps is laid down, deploying another immediately destroys the oldest one.
Enemy champions who step on a trap set it off, rooting them for 1s and make they bleed over 3s, affecting them by slowness and in same time their armor is destroyed.

Dwarlin throwing an axe at a target location, the axe starts to chock enemies in the area, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit.
Can be throwed two at once before the cooldown.

Dwarlin starts to spark over his whole body, his basic attacks and Double Axes get a bonus magic damage and stunning his targets.
Stun effect can only effect the same enemy once per 2,5 seconds.

elany.name: Elany
elany.title: The Humanized Fairy
elany.desc: Elany is a fairy in the magical forest. Learned how to create herself bigger to fight for the elves. Her experience by fairy magic and fighting with an elven bow make her a big threat!

prop.Active: Elany fires an arrow up to the sky, a flaming bolt strike at a target location, dealing magic damage to all enemies in the area.
prop.Empowered: Ten more flaming bolts are aming nearby the targeted location in ten other target locations. Fireflies do a double damage this time.
prop.Damage: Magic: 10 / 40 / 70 / 100 / 130 (+100% Magic Power) (+2 per hero level = 40)

prop.Active: Elany become a small fairy, increases her movement speed and ignoring all sorts of harm and effects. While she is a fairy, she can't attack or use skills.
prop.Passive: Elanys basic attacks get a bonus magic damage.
prop.Empowered: Elany starts to heal in fairy form.
prop.Bonus: Magic: 10 / 40 / 70 / 100 / 130 (+100% Magic Power) (+2 per hero level = 40)

prop.Active:
Elany confuse enemies at a target location for a short duration, affected minions have a chance to fight the nearest enemy for a longer duration.
Affected enemies take a bonus magic damage from your first arrow hit the last 3.5 seconds.
prop.Empowered: In the blossom circle, make your enemy heroes as a prisoner for 3,5 seconds, they can't go or dash or leap out from the circle.

prop.Active: Elany empowering her next ability cast within the next 8 seconds, adding an additional effect.
prop.Passive: Elany get increased magic power.

frank.name: Frank
frank.title: The Alchemist
frank.desc: Frank own the Library Tower and got a own labb under his office where he experiments with the experimental rats, and other animals, He doesn't has experience by using magic, but his own working potions makes him more excited in fights with his crossbow.

prop.Active: Frank throw a potion at a target location, affect all enemies by poison, dealing true magic damage per seconds over a time.

Frank throw a potion at a target location, randomly affects enemies by Confusion, Contrarwise, Charm or Mesmerize over a duration. All enemies get randomly affects, but monsters just get confused and decreased Armor.
Active again he switch potion to give allies in a target location mana and magic protection.
Frank drink a potion, increases his power and attack speed over a time.
Frank throw a potion at a target location, blast the area and dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.
prop.Passive: Frank go in stealth mode after 5 seconds if out of combat.

lancel.name: Lancel
lancel.title: The Longest Sight
lancel.desc: Lancel lives in the small villages outside the city of Peace, with a ruth life he struggled and helped the poor people by taking from the rich. With his great long bow and easy movable body he got the longest distance in fights!

prop.Active: Lancel fires multi of arrows in a cone in a long distance front of you, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.
Lancel performs a slide in a direction he is currently traveling, increases his attack speed for a short duration after he slide.

Lancel fires an arrow bound to a rope. The first enemy hero hit, they become binded to you for a short duration. Dealing physical damage to the enemy hero hit and silence they movement tactics and slowing they movement speed while they caught.
prop.Passive:
Successful hitting enemies with his basic attacks, Lancel get a increased range with both his tactics and his basic attacks.
Ends then he out of combat in 5 seconds.

prop.Active:
Lancel aiming for the sky, every second, the size increases and you can launch at a target location much far away, dealing physical damage at a target location and increases the damage done till the maximum size.
Become interrupted from taking harm in this stance.

leo.name: Leo
leo.title: The Eye of A Phoenix
leo.desc: Leo lives in City of Mordune together with Fenrir, leader of the offencive squad in the military. With her fire power as magic, her Bow tactics are incredibly dangerous to the enemies in fights.

prop.Active: Leo fires a flaming arrow at the first enemy hit in a line, dealing physical damage and an extra magic damage to enemies affected by the Fire Ravens.
Leo jumping away from your location, fires a burning flame at the location she stood at, dealing physical damage instant to the enemies hit.

Leo fires a raven that burning enemies in a line, split up to three new ravens that start to search for three nearby enemies to burn. Dealing magic damage to burned enemies over a time and the ravens can stack to the same enemy to stack the burning affect.
Leo turns on the bow to the sides, sending a burning wave of wings that flying through enemies in a line, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit. Reaches quite far.

lucifer.name: Lucifer
lucifer.title: The Life Eater
lucifer.desc: Lucifer is a vampire and lives with his brothers and sister in the Abandoned Castle, he ain't just skilled with his bow and hunting skills, he also can taking life and create pain against his enemies. With both healing himself and dealing incredible damage, he became a dangerous vampire!

prop.Active: Lucifer launch a magical arrow in a line, dealing magic damage with a bonus damage of they current health and healing him self by a % of it.
prop.Passive: Enemies hit by your arrows cause a blood drop with a maximum of 5 blood drops. Each blood drop let Bloody Hell deal a bonus magic damage to the affected enemy and heal himself by the half amount of the bonus magic damage.
prop.Blood Drop: Magic: 40 (+2 per hero level = 80 at level 20)

prop.Active: Lucifer taking out health from enemies at a target location, dealing true magic damage from a % of they maximum health.
Lucifer take a % of his own health, to increase his physical power for a short duration.

Lucifer launch a magical root that roots the first enemy hit, extending slowly to nearby enemies. Touching other enemies they will take the same pain as the targeted enemy, dealing magic damage and a % true magic damage of they maximum health while they entangled.

mei.name: Mei
mei.title: The Ice Cold Pirate
mei.desc: Mei is a pirate living in Kingdom Port, took over her father's place by became captain of the pirates. She got the best enchantress with her with name Melody, and have always trying to catch the sea queen Ashera. Because of her ice magic, she can freeze her enemies, create incredible walls of ice and freeze the water as well, letting her walk on the sea as if she own it!

prop.Active: Mei shattering her loaded crystal, creates a cone of icicles front of her, chill and dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.
prop.Passive:
Killing a minion cause a same cone behind it that also chill and dealing physical damage to enemies hit. Double affect if killing enemy hero.
Criting with her basic attack agenst a freesed enemy destroy the freeze, but dealing true physical damage from a % of they maximum health.

prop.Active:
Mei creates a frozen wall to stop enemies, then the duration ends or if you activate before it ends, the wall explode to icicles. Dealing physical damage to each enemy hit and create the same chill affect as Splitting Crystal.
Active again before doing the skill, change the angle.

Mei spraying cold frost in her way, continuing to spray until she interrupts and can move while spraying. Dealing physical damage to the enemy hit per second and stacking with chill which eventually freezes them when they reach 100% but double affect to already chilled enemies.
Half of its damage against freeze enemies.

Mei creates a crystal that chilling all enemies at a target location and dealing physical damage per seconds, freeze enemies at last but Double effect to chilled enemies.
Half of its damage against freeze enemies.

phia.name: Phia
phia.title: The Deserted Bounty Hunter
phia.desc: Phia lives in the City of Desert as a bounty hunter, playing as a bandit self but lives to catch all the other bandits. Do always race by catching the bandits before the cowboy, Clear arrives. With her bola, bombs and her special crossbow she is prepared for fighting!

prop.Active: Phia throwing a bola at the first enemy hit in a line. Affecting enemies by slowness before its detonate, dealing physical damage to all enemies at the targeted area after it detonate.
Phia fires three arrows that piercing through enemies in a line, dealing physical damage to enemies hit.

Phia lay a sentry at a target location, start to fire arrows at random enemies or the target. Lasts up to 25 seconds. After the maximum amount of traps is laid down, deploying another immediately destroys the oldest one.
Phia lay a ticking bomb at a target location, after it detonating, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.

raven.name: Raven
raven.title: The Silent Sniper
raven.desc: Raven lives in the Abandoned City, found as just a child helpless without parents, was raised by the vampire Lucifer, now lives with her ravens as her name as well, and taking care of Sabrine as if she was her little sister. She fighting in silence and the last thing you hear is just a sound from a crow before you get hit by her arrow!

prop.Active:
Raven starts to fire black arrows, give her basic attacks a bonus magic damage.
Killing minions with this active, give you permanent bonus magic damage to Black Arrow.
Raven cause a magical force at a target location, silence and dealing magic damage that destroying their defences.

Raven leaps at a target location while becoming invisible, give her Silent Strike to her next basic hit.
Silent Strike: Silence the enemy and dealing a bonus damage by they maximum health as true damage.

Raven summoning her friends that targeting enemies, dealing physical damage over a duration.
Affected enemies can't go stright and have their movement speed reduced.

richard.name: Richard
richard.title: The Arcane Archer
richard.desc: Richard lives in City of Mordune, engaged with Riley. Has always study arcane magic and is known as the true user of arcane archery!

prop.Active: Richard fires five bolts at random targets inside a cone, dealing physical damage from each bolt and your next basic attack hit against choose targets piercing through a % of they armor as True damage. The bolts also can crit.
prop.Passive: Hit enemies with basic attacks decreases the cooldown of Arcane Bolts by 0,5 seconds.

prop.Active: Richard sending three arcane pixies that ensnare the first enemy hit by a prison, dealing magic damage.
prop.Item: Create a shield that deflect the first magical tactic on you, increases your mana and your Magic Power as well.

prop.Active:
Richard teleport to a target location, silence enemies in the targeted area and dealing magic damage to them.
Reduction 50% cooldown for Arcane Bolts.
Richard sending a % of his mana to an increadible arrow, dealing physical damage to all enemies in a line.

rogue.name: Rogue
rogue.title: The Tracker
rogue.desc: Rogue came from a small village near the big forest, her parents was killed by bandits that started her life. She was starting to train young, using her bow and a strong boomerang, then used it to do revansh against the bandits, she found them and did the revansh then started to live in the wild and stop bandits for killing innocent people.

prop.Active:
Rogue throw a boomerang like a half moon, stunning enemies hit and dealing physical damage.
Active twice, she throw the boomerang in a straight line instead, dealing half of the damage, but teleport to its end if active again while it is thrown. Double damage to minions and monsters.
Rogue play a sound from her flute, increases her and her allies attack speed for a long duration.
prop.Passive: Now you see footsteps from enemies 5 seconds behind and you also hear nearby enemies footsteps and can see a red arrow at what direction you hearing them.

prop.Active:
Rogue leap at a target location, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit, decreases their defence for a short duration.
Bow: Rogue launch arrows at a target location, slowing their movement speed and dealing physical damage to enemies hit.

Rogue switch to her bow, increases her Armor Penetration while she holding her bow.
While she has her dagger, increases her crit damage with a bloody effect and increases her crit chance for every time she not critting.

simin.name: Simin
simin.title: The Demon Hunter
simin.desc: Simin lives in Mordune, always fighting side by side with Diode and Tigra, But often in search after demons and vampire like a phantom, while Diode and Tigra stay in the kingdom for the protection in the military and the royal family.

prop.Active: Simin fires an arrow that piercing through enemies in a line, dealing piercing damage.

Simin launch an arrow at a target location, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.
Can't fires in a short range, but have increased sight.
prop.Passive:
Basic attacks from Simins arrows effecting your enemies with a poison from toxic silver, dealing physical damage over time.
Effected enemies can't become invisible and let you see them in a longer range.

prop.Active:
Simin launch an arrow at the first enemy hit, explode in to sharp pieces as a cone behind the targeted hit, dealing physical damage to the targeted hit, but piercing damage to enemies hit in the cone.
Enemies hit by the projectiles also got the toxic.

Simin launch a great arrow in a line, the first enemy hit get pushed back, dealing physical damage to the target and an other damage to all enemies the pushed enemy hit and also knock them back too.
If the target hit a wall, turret or a tree they be stunned.

snow.name: Snow
snow.title: The Bounty Hunter
snow.desc: Snow lives in Winterfall, lives to catch all bounties like a ninja. He is a dangerous hunter with many names to hide himself from other bounty hunters, do everything for gold, fighting is his life.

prop.Active:
Snow fires an arrow at the first enemy hit, detonate after 1,5 seconds after hit an enemy, dealing physical damage and can crit.
In crit, the detonate dealing true damage.
Snow fires metal stars that piercing through enemies in a cone, dealing physical damage and make them bleed. Affecting enemies by slowness while bleeding.
Snow jump over things he get close to, increases his movement speed and attack speed a short duration.

Snow targeting a nearby tree, turret, building or other high things, ignoring all harming or effects and let your Stars fire at a Target Location, Bounty Bomb also hit a Target Location, detonate and dealing half of its physical damage as true damage to all enemies in the targeted area.
Leaves make you jump to a targeted location.
prop.Passive: Snow get increased crit damage.

spiro.name: Spiro
spiro.title: The Spirit Seeker
spiro.desc: Spiro is a elven who lives in City of Forest, big brother to Chantrea, but chose the spiritual power front of the royal duty. Chantrea got the moon power, but Spiro developed a spiritual power from the inner him created by spiritual energy from the nature.

prop.Active: Spiro launch an arrow to a target location while vault to the direction he goes, dealing physical damage to all enemies in the small area from a spiritual field created by the arrow that also reducing their movement speed.

Spiro summons a spirit that searching for enemies, floating around in the target location for 30 seconds and sense stealthed enemies. Dealing physical damage and affecting the target it find by slowness.
This spirit is invisible to it catch one enemy and can just catch same enemy each spirit.
Spiro detonate the power of his spiritual arrows stack at enemies, dealing physical damage to all enemies stack by arrows and reduce their movement speed.
prop.Passive: All basic attacks stacking at enemies body.

prop.Active: Spiro take his life for every arrow launched, but he got increased Physical Power and every basic attack, a spiritual nova is created and dealing physical damage to all closed enemies.
prop.Passive: Spiro got increased Life steal.

tumblr.name: Tumblr
tumblr.title: The Shielded Huntress
tumblr.desc: Tumblr lives in Winterfall, loving then Dwarlin always pick a fight against her, sees him like a little brother of his size. She's like a great viking, with her tactics with her shield and spear she is incredible in fights!

prop.Active: Tumblrs next four basic attacks get an increased attack speed and the spears get armor penetration.

Tumblr shield her self and block a % of all incoming damage at her front for a short duration.
While this is active, she doesn't walk slower backwards.
prop.Passive: Every Fith basic attack, she block the next projectile that hit her shield from the front.

prop.Active:
Tumblr throw her spear at a target location, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit and reduce their movement speed.
Taking this up decreases the cooldown of this skill.

Tumblr increases her and her allies movement speed for a long duration.
In the duration, her Four Spears get an increased attack speed.

anders.name: Anders
anders.title: The Spirit Torturer
anders.desc: Anders lives in Mordune, right hand to the king and working to get the truth from the criminals. He's a perfect spirit user, creating spiritual weapons to catch or pierce enemies body just to hurt or torture enemies.

prop.Active:
Anders strike enemies with a spiritual hammer that crushing their spirit, dealing magic damage and debuff their strength for a short duration.
Strike at three different stances. In a line, in a cone or in an area that stacking the debuff three times.
At a target location, Anders creates four spiritual swords that strike all at once, dealing magic damage and reduce their movement speed.

Anders catch the first enemy hero hit in a line, dealing physical damage and reduce their movement speed.
Ending if they escape the maximum size.

Anders catch all enemies in a big size around him, if they stay inside the size, they become pulled to him after 2,5 seconds, dealing physical damage to pulled enemies, but before the pull, they get reduced movement speed.
He can walk while he chained them, but become stunned for 0,5 seconds after pulling them.

asula.name: Asula
asula.title: Armored Princess
asula.desc: Princess Asula lives in the city of Kingdom Port, the oldest sister by Anni, Aenna and cousin to Diode from City of Mordune. Asula is inherited the throne, she is the captain by the military forces, side by side with Tána and their healer Malin. With her magical powers increases her tactics in the fights.

prop.Active: Asula sending a magical energy from her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit in a line. It also catch the last enemy hero hit, let her dash to the targeted hero and stunning all enemies in her way including the target by her shield.
Asula increases her and her allies physical and magic power for a short duration.

Asula creates a magical mirror on her shield, creates a destructive armor front of her which also stops the attacks to get through.
Ability projectiles that hit the mirror, sends back.
Asula gain power from the angels, heal her and her allies around her per second and increases their and her magic protection for the healing duration.

diana.name: Diana
diana.title: Cleric of The Sun
diana.desc: Diana lives in the holy church in City of Kingdom Port, best friend to Ania, Pius and Malin. She also is a cleric that believes in the goddess of the sun, blinding enemies and burning them with her spear by holy magic.

prop.Active: Diana throwing a spear of flames, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit in a line.

Diana creates a magical shield around her, absorbing all sorts of attacks the following duration.
The end of the duration, the shield expires and creating a nova that dealing magic damage to all enemies in a area, increased with all the absorbing damage.
Diana blinds enemies with her shield in a cone for 1 second, decreases their protection for a short duration and they can't move straight.
Diana sending a light from the sky, stunning enemies hit for 1 second in the target location and dealing magic damage.

diode.name: Diode
diode.title: The Crusader
diode.desc: Diode lives in the City of Mordune, cousin to princess Asula in Kingdom Port, rival to the shield master Rebecca in the city of Peace, lives as a crusader and also is a believer. Crushing enemies with her mace and always are good with her shouting voice to taunting enemies!

prop.Active: Diode strike with her mace increased by god power, dealing physical damage to all enemies in a cone and destroying their armor for a short duration.
Diode taunt all enemies around her, give her a bonus destructive armor per enemy taunted.
prop.Passive:
Diode get a buff called Revansh, increases the damage to her next Mace Swing.
The buff stacks every time she take damage.

prop.Active:
Diode trap enemies inside a circle with swords circulating the area, dealing physical damage per second to enemies inside the area.
Enemies can't go out or in to/from the area.

Diode be lift by an angel, after lock a target location, she strike in the target location, stunning enemies and dealing physical damage.
Diode can't be attacked then she up on the sky.

dracula.name: Dracula
dracula.title: Vampire Lord
dracula.desc: Dracula lives in the Abandoned Castle, oldest by the sister and brothers, and also the leader of the vampires. He got a blade and his gigantic shield by a head of the king of the bats in the demon world, because of his gigantic body and wings he can be kind of dangerous by also ignoring he got pain.

prop.Active: Dracula strike all enemies in a cone front of him with a gigantic bite, dealing physical damage and heal him a % of all the damage from each enemy. Enemies hit have they movement speed reduced for a short duration.

Dracula kick one enemy away in a line, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit and reduce their movement speed.
Double effect from minions and also slow the targets the minion hit with double effect.
Dracula leaps to a target location, dealing physical damage to all enemies in the area and also reduce their movement speed.
Dracula laugh and fear all enemies around him, dealing physical damage per ,25 seconds who is catch by his fear.

elise.name: Elise
elise.title: The Crystal Warrior
elise.desc: Elise lives in City of Ice, right hand to princess Emiza and like her sister, found helpless in a cave and taken care of by the royal family. Now she working in the military defences, carrying on a self-built armor, hammer and shield. Her strong attacks and the force of ice magic makes her harmless to kill!

prop.Active: Elise dash to the first enemy hit, strike with her hammer and dealing physical damage to the target and smash them up to the sky.

Elise creates crystals on her armor, give her a destructive armor.
After the armor destroys, it shattering icicles around her, dealing physical damage to all enemies nearby, or she can just active again to shattering the icicles by herself.

Elise smash her hammer at the ground, creates a line of crystals, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.
Affecting enemies by slowness by walking on the following created field and enemies that are landing on this field by Up Smash or other abilities that do alike are taking increased damage.

Elise smash her hammer at the ground, make her enemies stumble down at the ground, dealing physical damage and creates an icy field.
Every crystal enemies walk over on the field take physical damage and have they movement speed reduced.

fenrir.name: Fenrir
fenrir.title: The Armored Phoenix
fenrir.desc: Fenrir lives in City of Mordune together with Leo, leader of the defensive squad in the military. With his mace and fire power as magic, he can run and not to bother if he got any harm, he just continues burning his enemies!

prop.Active: Fenrir start to burn all enemies in a cone for 3 seconds, dealing magic damage per second.
Fenrir start to burn the ground he walk over, creates a trail behind him that burn enemies per seconds who walking over the trail.

Fenrir creates a wall of flame that affecting all enemies that walking through it by Burn, dealing magic damage per second.
Enemies standing in wall of flame are burning, dealing XX magic damage per second. Leaving wall of flame deals XX magic damage over 3 seconds. Active again before doing the skill, change the angle.

Fenrir create a burning skin that burning enemies near him, dealing magic damage per second.
If he dies with this active, he resurrect with just 30% of his maximum health.
prop.Passive: Fenrir get increased Health Regen and Magic Protection.

golem.name: Golem
golem.title: The Lonely Soul
golem.desc: Golem lives self in the mountains, scare away people who walks through the mountain path. He is a lonely soul with no friends and doesn't know his background and how he came to, he is just a big rock with thoughts and feelings that crush enemies he sees.

prop.Active:
Golem smash at the ground, dealing physical damage to all enemies front of him in a line and reduce their movement speed for a long duration.
Can be active again to smash the ground but dealing physical damage to all enemies around him in a small area, instead of slowing enemies, this giving him a buff of strength by same duration.
Golem creates a destructive armor to him and his allies for a long duration.
prop.Passive:
Golem get a destructive armor after 5s out of combat.
Golem also get a thorn from his armor and 30% of his Armor increases his Physical Power included his destructive armor.

prop.Active: Golem leap to a target location, dealing physical damage to all enemies and smash them up to the sky.

Golem starts to channel, crating an earthquake as a nova. After 2,5 seconds he dealing physical damage to all enemies in the area around him.
While channel, he affecting enemies by slowness in the target area around him.

grey.name: Grey Wonder
grey.title: The Wise Man
grey.desc: Grey Wonder lives in the city of Forest, the wise man to the high family and teacher to Chantrea. He can wispering to wisps and expert to use energy magic from the nature, ore summoning the nature by self.

prop.Active: Grey Wonder sending a magical energy through enemies in a line, dealing magic damage and reduce their physical power.
prop.Passive: Every spell used nearby Grey Wonder, give his staff energy. After get 5 stacks, his next basic attack dealing a bonus magic damage. 10s cooldown.
prop.Bonus: Magic: 50 / 75 / 100 / 125 / 150 (+2,5 per hero level = 50 at level 20)

prop.Active: Grey Wonder increases his physical power and armor, half to nearby allies.
prop.Passive: Grey Wonder get increased armor and a % of his armor increases armor to nearby allies.

prop.Active: Grey Wonder summon a wisp to ward in a target location, they see invisibility.
prop.Passive: Grey Wonder get a floating wisp over his shoulder, increases his magic protection and mark enemies hit by nightvision. You and nearby allies can se the enemy even though their invisible.

prop.Active: Grey Wonder summoning ents around in a circle like a wall, attacking enemies close to them. Dealing physical damage and stop enemies to go through them.

oone.name: Oone
oone.title: The Archangel
oone.desc: Oone is a archangel of light with healing tactics, leader of the military by the light angels. Older brother to Aria, and the best swordsman in the world!

prop.Active: Oone swing his mighty sword, dealing physical damage and stealing their protection for a short duration.
prop.Passive: Enemy hit by this sword stacking up his physical power to he is out of combat for 10 seconds (max 20 stacks)

prop.Active: Oone flying up and fast leap to a target location, smash enemies up to the air, increases his movement speed and attack speed for a short duration.
Oone heal him and his allies around him instantly, 10% more per stack from Mighty Sword but end all the stacks after use.
Oone dash forward and strike all enemies in the line with his sword, dealing physical damage and stacking his Mighty Sword per enemy hit with a double effect.

pius.name: Pius
pius.title: Fighter for Justice
pius.desc: Pius lives in the holy church in City of Kingdom Port, best friend to Ania, Diana and Malin. He also is a paladin, fighting for justice and destroy all evil in the world by his hammer and blessed powers.

prop.Active:
Pius sending a magical hammer in a line to the first hero hit, dealing magic damage and stunning the target.
Also dealing magic damage to all enemies in the line before hitting a hero.
prop.Passive: Pius get increased power to his basic attacks and a % bonus magic damage by his power.

prop.Active: Pius creates a five-point star circle of holy under him, shield and heal him and his allies who standing on this circle.
Pius sending a light of holy at a target localtion, heal and give armor to allies, but dealing magic damage to enemies hit by this light.
Pius debuff all enemies in a target location, decreasing their power and protection for a short duration.

rebecca.name: Rebecca
rebecca.title: The Shield Master
rebecca.desc: Rebecca lives in the city of Peace, always fighting for skills and dreaming of a peaceful world, also rival to the crusader Diode. She is also the greatest shield master in the world, fighting with it like it was her right hand like a main weapon as her mace.

prop.Active: Rebecca bash all enemies front of her with her shield, dealing physical damage and stunning them.
prop.Passive: Rebecca get a chance to bash her target with her basic attack, dealing a % increased damage of her physical power and stunning them.

prop.Active:
Rebecca throw her shield in a line, dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit and start to bounce up to 5 enemies in a 30 radius.
While the shield is bouncing, she can't do Bash, Shield Rush or other shield item skills the following seconds including the block chance.
Rebecca dash forward, push back all enemies and dealing physical damage to them.

Rebecca start to ignore 30% of all physical damage against her, blocking all piercing projectiles for hurting allies from behind.
She also get increased damage to her shield skills.

rohan.name: Rohan
rohan.title: The Scorpion King
rohan.desc: Lives in the Deserted Path by himself, trading with humans by giving them protection. Against bounty hunters he is hard to be find, by his tail he poisoned his enemies and destroying their armor with his strong claws and creating much sand eddies.

prop.Active: Rohan strike with his tail, poisoning all enemies in a line, dealing true physical damage for a short duration and reducing their Physical Power.
prop.Passive: His third basic attack destroying their armor in a cone for a short duration.

prop.Active: Rohan creates a circulating storm around him by sand, give him increased armor. Every time his third basic attack have been done, Rohan spitting sand in the cone, dealing piercing damage to enemies hit.

Rohan creates quicksand in a target location, reduce their movement speed.
If an enemy stay still on the sand for 2s, their knees are stuck in the sand and can't move.

Rohan rush to a target location, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.
Can be use from bot lane to top lane, no limit.

tana.name: Tána
tana.title: Hero of Justice
tana.desc: Tána lives in City of Kingdom Port, believe in justice and fight side by side with princess Asula. From living in the streets, she climbed quite high in order to reach her goal. Now with her golden whip and sword she clearing the city from crimes.

prop.Active:
Tána dash through all enemies in a line, dealing physical damage to all enemies addition 25% of an amount between her maximum health and the enemies maximum health as true damage.
Basic attacks decreases this cooldown by 0,5 seconds and counting on all enemy hits by Sword of Justice.
prop.True Damage: True: +25% Between they Maximum Health (250 Maximum Damage)

prop.Active:
Tána throw her sword, piercing through enemies in a line and dealing physical damage both forward and back to Tána.
Loosing her basic attack, but left click and the sword coming back.

Tána catch the first enemy hero hit, decrease their physical power and movement speed while they caught.
Her next basic attack at this target hero do an extra true damage from a % of her maximum health.
Tána leap to a location and cause an incredible physical damage to all enemies in the target location.

tank.name: Tank
tank.title: The Soul Stealer
tank.desc: Tank lives in the city of Mordune, left hand to the king, and does horrible things for him.

prop.Active: Tank breathe out deadly souls in a cone, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit. Kill enemy on hit heal him 12% of their maximum health.
prop.Passive:
He get a bonus magic damage from a % by his magic protection.
Killing enemies give him permanent health and also heal after killing. Double effect from killing heroes.

prop.Active:
Tank throw his sword at a target location, dealing physical damage to all enemies and reduce their movement speed.
Enemies with 30% health or less get killed, giving him the permanent health buff. Attacking makes the sword fall back to his hand.
Tank dash forward, strike all enemies in the line and sending them up to the air, dealing physical damage.
Tank burst out souls in a area around him, dealing magic damage and reduce their movement speed.

aenna.name: Aenna
aenna.title: The Blooded Bandit
aenna.desc: Aenna lives in the city of Kingdom Port, older sister to Anni but younger sister to Asula. After she become a teenager, she runned away and lived her own life in the big city, became the blooded bandit. With her water power she got some usefull to her fighting stile and creates mirrors to fool her enemies before they execution.

prop.Active: Aenna throw her second blade at the first enemy hit in a line, for 3,5s her next basic attack agenst that enemy is increased with piercing damage, and also she can teleport behind the target by activate this again.
Aenna creates a mist in a target location, makes Aenna invisible inside it and chilling enemies. After attacking, she become invisible after ,5s out of combat.

Aenna creates a mirror of ice in a target location that she can get inside and move to other placed mirrors nearby the targeted by A or D. Active this inside the mirror creates a decoy by your self, get hit by a enemy it explode and catch nearby enemies by a water prison that dealing physical damage per ,25s.
From the mirror, she can throw her Second Blade.
prop.Duration: 3 seconds [How long she can stay inside a mirror]

prop.Active: Aenna sending a dragon of water in a line, dealing physical damage to each enemy hit.

albin.name: Albin
albin.title: The Spirit Hunter
albin.desc: Albin lives in the land of spooky, but came from the city of Peace. He trying to search for answer about spirits and the world between us and they. To survive he fight in silence, snipe enemies with his crossbow and hunting down enemies with his haunted spears and his main weapon.

prop.Active: Albin launch an arrow from his crossbow on his back, dealing piercing damage to the first enemy hit.
Albin call for spirits to protect him, stealing health from enemies around him and protect a % of all incoming damage and ignoring armor penetration like piercing damage.

Albin throw a haunted spear in a target location, dealing piercing damage to all enemies hit. He can throw up to three spears that stay on the ground till you become too far away or pick it up to throw it again.
Nearby a spear can let you vault to it by press W twice.

Albin call for the spirits inside his haunted spear, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit around the spears and reduce they movement speed. Dispelling all summonings and decoys. The damage is stealing health that sends to you.

ashera.name: Ashera
ashera.title: The Sea Queen
ashera.desc: Ashera lives in the ocean, call her self the sea queen! Many pirates have tried to find her and kill her, but she is to clever. Because of her four arms she fighting with four blades, and can manipulate the enemy's mind.

prop.Active: Ashera winds in a line, dealing physical damage to all enemies by her swords. For 4s she ignoring slow effects [non-chill].
prop.Passive: Ashera have increased movement speed.

prop.Active: Ashera create a noisy scream in nearby enemies head, reduce their protection and make them paralyzed.
Ashera slice with her blades in a cone, dealing physical damage to enemies hit.
prop.Passive: Attacks from Asheras blades increases her movement speed.

prop.Active: Ashera becomes an unstoppable force of destruction, creating a damage aura around her. During this time, she can be reduced to 1 Health, but cannot die. She is Immune to Knockup, Slow effects, and protected from Root, but still vulnerable to Stuns. If Ashera is under 15% of her total Health at the end of the duration, she will heal to 15% Health.
prop.Life Steal: 33% of the damage dune per ticking damage

chin.name: Chin
chin.title: Master of Katana
chin.desc: Chin lives in the city of Peace, lives silently by him self, no one have ever seen his face and they call him the Ninja Demon. He is brother to Hana without she even know. In the childhood he saved her many times from to be killed, but she was always unconscious to know that he has done for her. He always runs on Blakes footsteps like they was rivals and she is the only one who know his face. He's a master with Katana but not cold blooded like Blake.

prop.Active: Chin dash with his katana, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.
Chin drops a smoke bomb, become invisible for a short duration. Gain bonus movement speed in stealth.
Chin strikes three basic attacks to random enemies in a cone.
Chin get close to an enemy, strike it then both are stopped and then jump back. Dealing true damage over a bleeding time.

diablo.name: Diablo
diablo.title: The Demon Child
diablo.desc: Diablo lives in the city of Desert, alone with only his shadows as family. He renaim himself Diablo, because of the people call him the demon child. Defena told him to find himself, so he found Lilith in the city of peace who become his first friend. Now he just traveling with his two swords.

prop.Active: Diablo jump to a target location, strike with his both swords and create a burning flame, dealing physical damage to enemies hit.
prop.Passive:
Every fifth basic attack creates a cone of fire, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and burn them over a time.
Diablo dealing a bonus magic damage to burning enemies.

prop.Active: Diablo creates a five-point star circle under him, burning enemies standing on it and increases his protection while he standing on it.

Diablo sending one of his five shadows, dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit and reduce their movement speed.
40% of this damage is doubled agenst a burning enemy.

Diablo sending all of his five shadows to a target location, dealing physical damage to each enemy hit.
Enemies see the target location before the shadows has arrived, if Diablo kill a hero enemy, you can use this again but only 50% of the damage. Can last 5 times.

drya.name: Drya
drya.title: Keeper of the Nature
drya.desc: Drya lives in the forest, she is a keeper of the nature and catch every single enemy that harm the forest and are a danger to the animals. She don't accept humans except Brynhildr and Caity that are a friend to the nature. A human have never seen her true form, she only show her self as a reindeer. Once Anni took a look on her eyes and understood who it was, while Drya accept her just because her friendly to the animals.

prop.Active: Drya creates some roots in a line, dealing physical damage and reduce their movement speed.
Drya transforming to a spiritual reindeer, gain bonus movement speed and the ability to walk through walls, trees and turrets. In this mode, she become invulnerable to all effects and damage.
Drya activate a force from the nature, increases her next basic attack by a bonus magic damage.
prop.Passive: Drya get an increased attack speed after succeed a crit.

prop.Active: Drya creates a entangling area by thorn, dealing physical damage per second and ensnare enemies hit. Reduce their movement speed inside the area.

hana.name: Hana
hana.title: The Pink Samurai
hana.desc: Hana lives in the city of Peace, alone in a rich house with the only sakura tree in the city by a family who know her parents. Her parents died in a fire then she was young, now she have been training under the sakura tree and become the pink samurai! She and Lotus are rivals and without knowing she is a younger sister to Chin. With a power to controlling sakura leaves like small pinked blades makes her to a dangerous samurai!

prop.Active:
Hana creates some sakura leaves that circulating her sword, give her basic attacks a bonus piercing damage to enemies hit.
The leaves also bounce up to two enemies after hitting one and can activate again while this is active, letting her sending some blades through all enemies in a line, dealing piercing damage hit.

Hana creates some sakura leaves in a target location, starting to circulating in the circle, stop enemies to run in or out from the area. After 3s they all strike to the mitt at the same time, dealing piercing damage to each enemy hit.
Can't use nearby you.

Hana teleport to a target with the opposite direction from their eyes.
Can teleport to a ward.
Her next Sakura Blades one of choose three are going to catch an enemy with no piercing damage, in the end of the catch, dealing piercing damage to the target.

katana.name: Katana
katana.title: The Shadow
katana.desc: Katana lives in the city of Peace with a ruth childhood. Her parents died then she was young, but she was never alone because of her only friend, Blade. Blade was looking up to Katana because of her skilled movements. Katana is an excellent rogue because of her shadow tactics. They both struggled to live in the big city, and whatever happened, they had each other.

prop.Active: Katana throw her dagger in a line, to the first enemy hit it start to bounce. Dealing physical damage and silence enemies hit, active again, she teleport to the enemy the bouncing dagger is on, and in same time drop a dagger on the ground before she teleport, like a ward without sight.
Katana teleport to an allied, ward or her dagger on the ground. Can be used on her wolves.
Katana teleport to one enemy, stab their back and dealing physical damage and silent them. Let her crit next attack and for a short time you can teleport back.

Katana creates shadows that mimetic her, strike nearby enemies with Shadow Stab or Bouncing Dagger, but just dealing 25% of all the damage. When they disappear, daggers throws nearby them, dealing physical damage hit.
They go through allies, can't take damage from enemies but disappears from [Mind] Crowd Controls.

leanish.name: Leanish
leanish.title: Angel of Power
leanish.desc: Leanish is an angel of power, defeating her enemies with her speed and creates lightning from her own hands. She also a black sheep of all the angels, because of the power she gain.

prop.Active:
Leanish creates lightning in a cone, dealing physical damage hit and stunning them.
can be changed to line, instead double the damage but doesn't stunning on hit.
Leanish creates a lightning prison in a target location, catch enemies hit and dealing magic damage per second.
Leanish dash forward, dealing physical damage to enemies hit by her wings on the sides.
In a flash, Leanish strike all enemies nearby her.

lotus.name: Lotus
lotus.title: The Moon Phantom
lotus.desc: She lives everywere, walking under the moonlight, taking shelter in caves, but sometimes she takes a few drinks in a bar. People who sees her talking about the moon phantom. She is not a dangerous person, but they who bothering her have said something for the last time.

prop.Active:
Creates two wind blades in a line, dealing physical damage hit.
In the end of the line, it become a piercing whirlwind. Dealing physical damage hit per seconds and silence their movement tactics. Active again Móna teleport to middle of the whirlwind.
Lotus pulling all nearby enemies to her with a chain, silence their movement tactics for a short duration.

Lotus start to spin around, dealing physical damage per hit.
While spinning she get increased movement speed and ignoring melee attacks.
Begin to channeling by spinning around, throws a flurry of blades, dealing physical damage each blade.

maria.name: Maria
maria.title: Masked Wind Bringer
maria.desc: Maria lives in the city of Mordune, throughout her life she has been living in a lie, made people trust her just to fix the information and continue living in her lie, with no idea of who she is, she has now been working on the same project, to be closer to the royal family to stop the war! Tigra is their right hand, and the true one to be a friend with just to fulfill her mission. With her power of creating piercing winds with her bladed wind fans, makes her to a dangerous rouge.

prop.Active:
For a long duration, Maria creating piercing winds in a cone by her basic attacks, dealing piercing damage each enemy hit.
Each enemy hit, decreases the cooldown of her skills by 0,5s.
prop.Passive: Hitting an enemy with her basic attack cause a piercing damage per second over a time, stacking up to 5 times.

prop.Active: Maria creates a piercing wind in a target location, dealing piercing damage hit and reduce their movement speed.
Maria teleport to a target location, creates a piercing wind away from her in the two places, dealing piercing damage to enemies hit.

Maria creates a piercing wind in a line, dealing piercing damage and reduce their movement speed.
Leave a trail that dealing piercing damage per second to enemies inside.

minae.name: Minae
minae.title: The Ninja of Japan
minae.desc: Minae lives in the city of peace, loving to fight and show her potential. Uses enchanting scrolls to get weapons to kill her opponents.

prop.Active: Minae open a scroll, taking her greatest weapon and dash forward, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and increases her physical power for a short duration.

Minae lay a scroll on a target location, explode when hit by a enemy. Dealing physical damage.
Invisible to enemies.
Minae jump up with two circulating scrolls, start to throw weapons at random enemies. Dealing physical damage to enemies hit.
Minae throw three umbrellas at the sky that start to sending needles on a target location, dealing piercing damage hit.

razor.name: Razor
razor.title: Sand Brother of Shadow
razor.desc: Razor lives in the city of Desert with his brother Rexas, they have always been the black sheep in the city and never catch by Clear the cowboy. They are called the rogue brothers! Razor is expert to use Kusarigama and makes him dangerous.

prop.Active: Razor catch the first enemy hit in a line, then dash to the target and do serious damage. Dealing physical damage and double the passive against the target.
prop.Passive: His basic attacks affects enemies by bleed.

prop.Active: Razor spin his Kusarigama one turn, dealing piercing damage to enemies nearby him and affecting they by the passive.
Razor throw his two Kusarigama and let it slice through enemies, dealing physical damage and reduce their movement speed.
Razor catch all enemies around him by summoned Kusarigama, dealing physical damage and silence their movement tactics.

relani.name: Relani
relani.title: The Blinded Angel
relani.desc: Relani is an angel of balance, she made a mistake and got her eyes off by an high archangel. By her blindness she have learned to analyze enemies by their energy flowing in their body. With her magical forces she punishment evil enemies.

prop.Active: Relani launch a magical orb in a line, dealing magic damage and reduce their protection and power.
Relani deflect all the incoming attacks the following 1,5s, then sending magical projectiles back at the deflected enemies. Dealing magic damage each projectile hit.
Relani fly to a target location, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit and get a shield that deflect a % of all damage at her.
Relani flies up, launch three magical orbs that punish enemies, dealing magic damage on hit in three target locations.

rexas.name: Rexas
rexas.title: The Sneaky Rogue
rexas.desc: Rexas lives in the city of Desert with his brother Razor, they have always been the black sheep in the city and never catch by Clear the cowboy. They are called the rogue brothers! Rexas is expert in the silently sneaky way to assassinate from behind that makes him dangerous!

prop.Active: Rexas dash to the first enemy in a line, cutting their throut and make them bleed.
prop.Passive: Rexas get increased crit chance. 100% crit chance against their back each for every 10s that silent enemies.

prop.Active: Rexas go inside the stealth mode, become invisible after 1,5s with no harm.
prop.Passive: Rexas get increased crit damage.

prop.Active: Rexas jump over his standing target, to get behind your target.
prop.Passive:
Rexas get increased movement speed.
For every 10s you jumping, you rolls faster and dodge ranged attacks.

prop.Active: Rexas throw a smoke bomb and blind all enemies inside the smoke.

sarah.name: Sarah
sarah.title: The Blade Master
sarah.desc: Sarah lives in the city of Kingdom Port, daughter to a blacksmith and have always been good with blades. Her mother died sick and they don't have much money, so she became a phantom to get money for killing people.

prop.Active:
Sarah put her two halfed chakram together and throw it like a boomerang, piercing through enemies in a line, dealing physical damage both times it moves.
Active again and teleport to the chakram.

Sarah throw her blade after hit with basic attacks, start to let her blades circulating around her and floating longer from the location. Dealing physical damage each hit and increase her attack speed.

Sarah dash forward, dealing physical damage hit and make they bleed, increases her physical power and destroy their armor.
Circulating Blades let the throwed blades come back and dealing their damage each.
Sarah throwing out blades that stay still in the maximum radius. You become invisible for a short duration, then all the blades will strike back to you, dealing Physical Damage both times they moves.

suki.name: Suki
suki.title: The Succubus
suki.desc: Suki is a Succubus from the underground, lives to make men as her slaves. Now she lives in the city of piece, using dark magic to kill her enemies. Also she is an dangerous woman!

prop.Active: Suki leap to a target location, dealing physical damage hit, killing a unit heal you a % of they maximum health and let her use this again. Hitting no enemies, let her use this again but no mana cost. (only once)
Suki launch a magical orb in a line, ensnare the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage over time.
Suki creates a wave of darkness coming from the ground, dealing magic damage hit and reduce their protection.
Suki charm all enemies in her area, dealing a bonus magic damage to the first enemy she attack.

tigra.name: Tigra
tigra.title: The Killing Assassin
tigra.desc: Tigra lives in the city of Mordune, doing importend errands for the King. She was picked up by the king when she was little, was growing as an assassin in his order. Maria, who believe that they are friends, are suspicious, Tigra understand her better than she thinks. She is fighting with blades like three nails each hand, with a smooth body makes her dangerous in close combat!

prop.Active:
Tigra jump to a target location, silence enemies and give they a mark.
Marked enemies takes a % of they maximum health from physical attacks as true damage.
prop.Passive: Tigra get energy for each basic hit, after five energy point, she strike a powerfull hit, dealing a % of your targets maximum health as true damage and stun the target.

prop.Active: Tigra lay a trap that become invisible after 0,5s. Activates by nearby enemies that start to launch bouncing lightning at the nearest enemy, dealing magic damage each lightning and stun for 0,5s.
Tigra slash all nearby enemies, make them bleed for a long duration.
Tigra throw a flash bomb on a target location, slowing them over time after stunning.

walladin.name: Walladin
walladin.title: The Bat Master
